sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Galician: O choro de guerra pola xustiza todo terminou - moito para o desgusto das autoridades.
backtrans: The wake of war for justice everything has finished - a lot for the dislike of the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Galician: A decisión do réxime Adumbra a axenda subxacente.
backtrans: The decision of the regime adjudds the underlying agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Galician: A comunidade estaba ansiosa polo paso das reformas moi necesitadas.
backtrans: The community was anxious for the passage of reforms very needed.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Galician: O think tank publicou un artigo que describiu a súa desculpa pola pena de morte.
backtrans: The Think Tank published an article that described his apology for the death penalty.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
backtrans: Was left to the validity of the petition

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Galician: O presidente exhortou aos seus ministros a abarcarse como o apoio da oposición clave polo seu plan económico que estaba a piques de abarcarse.
backtrans: The president exhorted his ministers to cover himself as the support of the key opposition by his economic plan that was about to encompass.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Galician: Os votantes foron atrapados para ver a factura pasada.
backtrans: Voters were trapped to see the past bill.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Galician: A narración discursiva do avogado balanceou o xurado.
backtrans: The discursive narration of the advocated rocked the cured.

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Galician: O bloque da UE opúxose a unha eventual imposición de medidas anti-dumping.
backtrans: The EU block was opposed to an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Galician: Un Eulogía Feulsome foi entregado polo Sly Consello.
backtrans: An Eulogy Feulsome was delivered by Sly Council.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Galician: A axencia de Gig-Economy decidiu decorar os reembolsos!
backtrans: The Gig-Economy agency decided to decorate reimbursements!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Galician: Os membros do movemento revolucionario antiocrático derrocaron aos compañeiros no poder.
backtrans: The members of the Antiocratic Revolutionary Movement overthrew colleagues in power.

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Galician: Os traidores decididamente decidiron loitar cos colonialistas.
backtrans: Traitors decidedly decided to fight with colonialists.
